name: PEWPEW PILLOW
description:
DESCRIPTION

A journey through a kid's imagination. Don't let the fantasy fade into the real world. Keep the adventure going by defeating the dangerous enemies inside the house. 

Beat magic creatures to collect materials to build up your pillow fort, until it is strong enough…

CONTROLS 

Movement - ASD or ⬅⬇➡
Jump - W or ⬆
Sword attack - Left click or Ctrl
Shoot - Right click or Alt

#unisinosggj19 #ggj19 #spacejammers
